short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for the Flockjay Sales Elevation Platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flockjay is a modern Generative Enablement platform that unifies Learning Management and Content Management for Sales Enablement teams. The Flockjay platform lets you easily manage your sales teams' content, learning, deal insights, coaching, & more - with the help of Generative AI. Flockjay's Chrome Extension makes it easy for sales teams to access and share sales calls, sales collateral, trainings, and best practices wherever they are.
